00052 // deep_neural_network : main deep neural network class
00054 
00055 lbann::deep_neural_network::deep_neural_network(const uint mini_batch_size,
00056                                                 lbann_comm* comm,
00057                                                 layer_factory* _layer_fac,
00058                                                 Optimizer_factory* _optimizer_fac)
00059   : sequential_model(mini_batch_size, comm, _layer_fac, _optimizer_fac),
00060     m_train_accuracy(0.0),
00061     m_validation_accuracy(0.0),
00062     m_test_accuracy(0.0) {}
00063 
00064 lbann::deep_neural_network::~deep_neural_network() {}
00065 
00066 void lbann::deep_neural_network::check_gradient(CircMat& X, CircMat& Y, double* gradient_errors)
00067 {
00068   // setup input (last/additional row should always be 1)
00069   Copy(X, *(m_layers[0]->Acts));
00070 
00071   // forward propagation (mini-batch)
00072   DataType L2NormSum = 0;
00073   for (size_t l = 1; l < m_layers.size(); l++)
00074     L2NormSum = m_layers[l]->forwardProp(L2NormSum);
00075 
00076   // backward propagation (mini-batch)
00077   for (size_t l = m_layers.size() - 1; l >= 1; l--) {
00078     m_layers[l]->backProp();
00079   }
00080 
00081   // check gradient
00082   gradient_errors[0] = 0;
00083   for (size_t l = 1; l < m_layers.size(); l++)
00084     gradient_errors[l] = m_layers[l]->checkGradientMB(*m_layers[l-1]);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void lbann::deep_neural_network::summarize(lbann_summary& summarizer) {
00088   for (size_t l = 1; l < m_layers.size(); ++l) {
00089     m_layers[l]->summarize(summarizer, get_cur_step());
00090   }
00091 }

00100 void lbann::deep_neural_network::train(int num_epochs, int evaluation_frequency)
00101 {
00102   do_train_begin_cbs();
00103 
00104   // Epoch main loop
00105   for (int epoch = 0; epoch < num_epochs; ++epoch) {
00106 
00107     // Check if training has been terminated
00108     if (get_terminate_training()) break;
00109 
00110     ++m_current_epoch;
00111     do_epoch_begin_cbs();
00112 
00114     m_execution_mode = execution_mode::training;
00115     for (size_t l = 0; l < m_layers.size(); ++l) {
00116       m_layers[l]->m_execution_mode = execution_mode::training;
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Train on mini-batches until data set is traversed
00120     // Note: The data reader shuffles the data after each epoch
00121     long num_samples = 0;
00122     long num_errors = 0;
00123     bool finished_epoch;
00124     do {
00125       finished_epoch = train_mini_batch(&num_samples, &num_errors);
00126     } while(!finished_epoch);
00127 
00128     // Compute train accuracy on current epoch
00129     m_train_accuracy = DataType(num_samples - num_errors) / num_samples * 100;
00130 
00131     if(evaluation_frequency > 0
00132        && (epoch + 1) % evaluation_frequency == 0) {
00133       // Evaluate model on validation set
00134       // TODO: do we need validation callbacks here?
00135       // do_validation_begin_cbs();
00136       m_validation_accuracy = evaluate(execution_mode::validation);
00137       // do_validation_end_cbs();
00138 
00139       // Set execution mode back to training
00140       m_execution_mode = execution_mode::training;
00141       for (size_t l = 0; l < m_layers.size(); l++) {
00142         m_layers[l]->m_execution_mode = execution_mode::training;
00143       }
00144     }
00145 
00146     do_epoch_end_cbs();
00147     for (Layer* layer : m_layers) {
00148       layer->epoch_reset();
00149     }
00150   }
00151   do_train_end_cbs();
00152 }
00153 
00154 bool lbann::deep_neural_network::train_mini_batch(long *num_samples,
00155                                                   long *num_errors)
00156 {
00157   do_batch_begin_cbs();
00158 
00159   // Forward propagation
00160   do_model_forward_prop_begin_cbs();
00161   DataType L2NormSum = 0;
00162   for (size_t l = 0; l < m_layers.size(); ++l) {
00163     do_layer_forward_prop_begin_cbs(m_layers[l]);
00164     L2NormSum = m_layers[l]->forwardProp(L2NormSum);
00165     do_layer_forward_prop_end_cbs(m_layers[l]);
00166   }
00167   *num_errors += (long) L2NormSum;
00168   *num_samples += m_mini_batch_size;
00169   do_model_forward_prop_end_cbs();
00170 
00171   // Update training accuracy
00172   m_train_accuracy = DataType(*num_samples - *num_errors) / *num_samples * 100;
00173   ++m_current_step;
00174 
00175   // Backward propagation
00176   do_model_backward_prop_begin_cbs();
00177   for (size_t l = m_layers.size(); l-- > 0;) {
00178     do_layer_backward_prop_begin_cbs(m_layers[l]);
00179     m_layers[l]->backProp();
00180     do_layer_backward_prop_end_cbs(m_layers[l]);
00181   }
00182   do_model_backward_prop_end_cbs();
00183 
00185   for (size_t l = m_layers.size() - 1; l > 0; --l) {
00186     m_layers[l]->update();
00187   }
00188   const bool data_set_processed = m_layers[0]->update();
00189 
00190   do_batch_end_cbs();
00191   return data_set_processed;
00192 }
00193 
00194 DataType lbann::deep_neural_network::evaluate(execution_mode mode)
00195 {
00196   switch(mode) {
00197   case execution_mode::validation:
00198     do_validation_begin_cbs(); break;
00199   case execution_mode::testing:
00200     do_test_begin_cbs(); break;
00201   default:
00202     throw lbann_exception("Illegal execution mode in evaluate function");
00203   }
00204 
00205   // Set the execution mode
00206   m_execution_mode = mode;
00207   for (size_t l = 0; l < m_layers.size(); ++l) {
00208     m_layers[l]->m_execution_mode = mode;
00209   }
00210 
00211   // Evaluate on mini-batches until data set is traversed
00212   // Note: The data reader shuffles the data after each epoch
00213   long num_samples = 0;
00214   long num_errors = 0;
00215   bool finished_epoch;
00216   do {
00217     finished_epoch = evaluate_mini_batch(&num_samples, &num_errors);
00218   } while(!finished_epoch);
00219 
00220   // Compute test accuracy
00221   m_test_accuracy = DataType(num_samples - num_errors) / num_samples * 100;
00222 
00223   switch(mode) {
00224   case execution_mode::validation:
00225     do_validation_end_cbs(); break;
00226   case execution_mode::testing:
00227     do_test_end_cbs();
00228     // Reset after testing.
00229     for (Layer* layer : m_layers) {
00230       layer->epoch_reset();
00231     }
00232     break;
00233   default:
00234     throw lbann_exception("Illegal execution mode in evaluate function");
00235   }
00236 
00237   return m_test_accuracy;
00238 }
00239 
00240 bool lbann::deep_neural_network::evaluate_mini_batch(long *num_samples,
00241                                                      long *num_errors)
00242 {
00243   // forward propagation (mini-batch)
00244   DataType L2NormSum = 0;
00245   for (size_t l = 0; l < m_layers.size(); l++) {
00246     L2NormSum = m_layers[l]->forwardProp(L2NormSum);
00247   }
00248   *num_errors += (long) L2NormSum;
00249   *num_samples += m_mini_batch_size;
00250 
00251   // Update layers
00252   // Note: should only affect the input and target layers
00253   for (size_t l = m_layers.size() - 1; l > 0; --l) {
00254     m_layers[l]->update();
00255   }
00256   const bool data_set_processed = m_layers[0]->update();
00257   return data_set_processed;
00258 }
